label: 太平楽
本: The Clear Mirror:  A Chronicle of Japanese Court During the Kamakura Period, (1185-1333) . Stanford University Press . 1998
説明文: A sword dance, performed by four persons, representing the unsuccessful attempt of Xiang Zhuang of Chu to kill Liu Bang, the founder of the Han dynasty. It was presented on auspicious occasions.　[項籍, 楚, 劉邦, 漢]
